US urges discussions with China on practical nuclear risk reduction stepsThe United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:24:07 GMT SBBOZ2QLRJLLRABKQGZHHXITQU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-urges-discussions-with-china-practical-nuclear-risk-reduction-steps-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US warns of Russian effort to tilt 2024 elections in Europe against UkraineThe United States believes Russia will conduct "information operations" aimed at turning opinion in Europe against Ukraine as countries across the continent go to the polls this year, the head of the State Department's office for disinformation said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:09:27 GMT 45FZ34IY6NM7BIJ5QQULGNJRJE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-warns- Russian-effort-tilt-2024-elections-europe-against-ukraine-2024-01-18/Simon Lewis世界
US, Chinese finance officials open meetings in BeijingU.S. Treasury and Chinese Finance Ministry officials started a two-day meeting in Beijing on Thursday to discuss financial stability and capital markets issues between the two economic powers, deepening an engagement revived last year. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:21:33 GMT Z22ZWSABUBNF5EK2YXWFBJT77A https://www.reuters.com/business/us-chinese-finance-officials-open-meetings-beijing-2024-01-18/Reuters商业
Li Haotong in four-way lead after first round of Dubai Desert ClassicFormer winner Li Haotong carded a five-under-par 67 in the first round for a four-way share of the lead in the Dubai Desert Classic at the Emirates Golf Club on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:45:44 GMT NGMU57UQVVKRLCAQDZYZS2TR4Q https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/li-haotong-four-way-lead-after-first-round-dubai-desert-classic-2024-01-18/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
Brazil's Lula to meet Chinese foreign minister on FridayBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will meet with China's visiting Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday afternoon in the northeastern Brazilian city of Fortaleza, a presidential spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:36:49 GMT LCFZRLKT2ZKVPKAOPUMGJBPHLA https://www.reuters.com/world/brazil-plans-to-meet-chinese-foreign-minister-friday-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
India's NMDC says it has no plans to export iron ore to ChinaIndia's NMDC Ltd , the country's largest state-owned iron ore miner, on Thursday said it has no plans to sell iron ore to China and it is scaling up production to meet domestic demand. Exclusive: Saudi Arabia still considering BRICS membership, sources saySaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the group last year, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 13:48:54 GMT IFZJFKFFLJP4ISO5GOT6D4UU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-arabia-considering-bric-membership-sources-2024-01-18/Maha Dahan, Dmitry Zhdannikov商业达沃斯
China's embrace of GMO crops gains momentum with new import, planting approvalsChina on Thursday approved additional varieties of genetically modified soybeans and corn for import and production while expanding their planting areas nationwide, as part of a drive to improve food security and reduce imports. No discussion of stake sale in China BMW joint venture - Shenyang documentBMW's partner in China has no plans to sell its stake in their joint venture, a document seen by Reuters on Thursday showed, contradicting media reports earlier this week.
